titleStmt.title: The sea-man's obligations to gratitude and a good life a sermon preach'd in the parish-church of Deptford, in Kent, June 5, 1699, before the corporation of the Trinity-house at their annual meeting on Trinity-Monday / by George Stanhope ...
titleStmt.author: Stanhope, George, 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
